title: Base Weight Optimizer
description: Analyze backpack base weight and surface heavy items.
pageDescription: Identify heavy gear quickly and reduce carried load before the trip.

sections.title: How To Use
content: Enter one item per line as item,weightKg.
Review total base weight and top five heaviest items.
Iterate by replacing or removing high-impact items.

sections.title: Why Base Weight Matters
content: Lower base weight improves pace and endurance.
Reduces fatigue and joint stress on multi-day routes.
Creates margin for water and food carries.

sections.title: Optimization Tips
content: Start with the top three heaviest items first.
Avoid cutting critical safety gear to chase numbers.
Re-check after each gear swap to track real progress.
